Additional (A) Evidence of erosion and s: SOME PROBLEMS WITH SILT RUNOFF FROM UPSTREAM FARMS AND A SMALL LOGGING OPERATION.
Additional (C) Water levels flow: LOW FLOWS IN SEPT. AND EARLY OCT. HIGH FLOWS IN LATE OCT AND EARLY NOV. GOOD FALL FLOWS.
Biological (D) Particulars of distributi: COHO SPAWNING THROUGHOUTSYSTEM FROM FENCE TO ABOVE DUNCAN BAY LOGGING ROAD
Comments (K): A LOGGING OPERATION IN THE NORTHY LAKE AREA AFFECTED THE SYSTEM WITH SILT AND DEBRIS RUN OFF. NO LONG LASTING AFFECTS WERE OBSERVED ON THE STREAM. NUMBERS WERE OBTAINED FROM THE FENCE CREW AND THE TAG RECOVERIES AFTER SPAWNING.
Dates of inspection (1): FENCE UP IN MID OCT. TAG RECOVERIES TO LATE DEC.
